im absolutely in love with this game i played this game when i was much younger with my step dads help and its remained a game that i adore it follows an interesting story line and has similar features to the original diablo or other dungeon crawler games with a heavy load of dungeon crawling and role play its got lovely maps and colours giving it extra touch of pretty distinctive abilities or enchantments if you want a throwback this game is the game to pick

i like this game

torchlight is a good game but it was kinda aa by 2009 standard so it lacks a few vital features you would expect from a game like this and some elements are not well made like selecting loot on the ground kinda sucks  the community created a lot of mods which add comfort and content and new and fun ways to play this  if you think this is for you make sure to try it out shortly after buying so you can get a refund if it is not to your taste

fun and simple hack  slash action rpg in the vein of diablo 1 but with qol from an 09 game i played it on normal which turned out to be way too easy it was fine for my run but if youre looking for some sort of challenge bump up the difficulty also be aware that inventory size is pretty limited even if your pet can hold items and return to town to tell them for you apparently mods can fix this and there are achievements for using mods but i did not use any
very fun so many choices on how to build your characters too

my first review was positive but after much thought i decided to change it to negative my reasons are as follows you cant change key bindings in game the class balance and late game balance is well off the grind is boring after a few hours in to the game inventory space is too small and the pricing is a bit high just buy the second game better in every aspect

its cute for sure but theres a couple of things wrong with this game  you cant change the keybinds which is a major annoyance and the balancing is terrible  charging 15 bucks for this in 2025 is an insult go get tl ii and mod the hell out of it

its a classic a little rough but very much like the fate series and i love it for that definitely worth a playthrough if you like simple dungenon crawlers like fate hardest difficulty is a grind though but you can prepare using the shared stash

this game came out at the perfect time when diablo 3 was taking forever to be launched i didnt have the patience to finish it then but im trying again after many years its a fun game easy to play with clear classes not too many item types and the pet addition is a nice touch

torchlight is a nice and somewhat cute timekiller perfect to spend an evening mindlessly clearing a dungeon after a hard day  problem is that as a game it is extraordinarily boring mess of grind poor gameplay design choices dull skill trees dull championboss fights and a difficulty curve which looks like jigsaw line i completed it on the hardest level very hard without permadeath and wouldnt waste my time on this ever again

torchlight is a simple and solid dungeon crawler held back by a lack of qol aswell as an atrocious difficulty spike in the later part of the game that killed the enjoyment for me despite some hiccups torchlight is still a really fun budget title i recommend it on a sale the only thing that would complete this game for me is if it had multiplayer but torchlight 2 has it so maybe youd want to pick up that one instead
love this classic game
decent and fun diablotype game but a lot easier to get into was one of the first games i ever played and its nice to return to it after so long
i loved the game growing up and to this day absolutely love it its simple to the point and fun to play 1010 hack and slash dungeon crawler it ticks all the boxes 100 recommend
torchlight is a pretty simple but fun game its not as complex as other top down rpgs but solid if you just want a good time

fun and simple hack  slash action rpg in the vein of diablo 1 but with qol from an 09 game i played it on normal which turned out to be way too easy it was fine for my run but if youre looking for some sort of challenge bump up the difficulty also be aware that inventory size is pretty limited even if your pet can hold items and return to town to tell them for you apparently mods can fix this and there are achievements for using mods but i did not use any

my first review was positive but after much thought i decided to change it to negative my reasons are as follows you cant change key bindings in game the class balance and late game balance is well off the grind is boring after a few hours in to the game inventory space is too small and the pricing is a bit high just buy the second game better in every aspect

its cute for sure but theres a couple of things wrong with this game  you cant change the keybinds which is a major annoyance and the balancing is terrible  charging 15 bucks for this in 2025 is an insult go get tl ii and mod the hell out of it

torchlight is a nice and somewhat cute timekiller perfect to spend an evening mindlessly clearing a dungeon after a hard day  problem is that as a game it is extraordinarily boring mess of grind poor gameplay design choices dull skill trees dull championboss fights and a difficulty curve which looks like jigsaw line i completed it on the hardest level very hard without permadeath and wouldnt waste my time on this ever again
